VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Crimson Group relative to Echo Dynamics?
SRP.A: Crimson Group is {below} Echo Dynamics in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Echo Dynamics relative to Crimson Group?
SRP.A: Echo Dynamics is {above} Crimson Group in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total r&d investment?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Echo Dynamics}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total r&d investment?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Crimson Group}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Echo Dynamics's minimum R&D Investment in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Echo Dynamics's minimum R&D Investment is in {2004}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Crimson Group's minimum R&D Investment in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Crimson Group's minimum R&D Investment is in {2007}.

NC.Q: Was the total R&D Investment in 2006 higher or lower than in 2012?
NC.A: The total r&d investment in 2006 was {lower} than in 2012.

NC.Q: Between 2005 and 2010, did the total R&D Investment experience a larger or smaller change than between 2006 and 2008?
NC.A: The change in total r&d investment between 2005 and 2010 was {larger} than between 2006 and 2008.

NC.Q: Was the total R&D Investment in 2006 higher or lower than in 2008?
NC.A: The total r&d investment in 2006 was {lower} than in 2008.

NC.Q: Was the total R&D Investment in 2009 higher or lower than in 2010?
NC.A: The total r&d investment in 2009 was {lower} than in 2010.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Echo Dynamics} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Crimson Group and Echo Dynamics first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Crimson Group and Echo Dynamics first exchanged leading positions in {2005}.
